display.name: display
display.syntax: block | inline | inline-block | flex | grid | none | ...
display.description: Controls the element's display type and how it participates in layout.

flex-direction.name: flex-direction
flex-direction.description: Defines the main axis direction for flex container children.

flex-wrap.name: flex-wrap
flex-wrap.description: Specifies whether flex items are forced onto a single line or can wrap.

flex-flow.name: flex-flow
flex-flow.description: Shorthand for setting both flex-direction and flex-wrap.

flex-grow.name: flex-grow
flex-grow.description: Determines how much a flex item will grow relative to others in the container.

flex-shrink.name: flex-shrink
flex-shrink.description: Determines how much a flex item will shrink relative to others in the container.

flex-basis.name: flex-basis
flex-basis.description: Specifies the initial main size of a flex item before space distribution.

justify-content.name: justify-content
justify-content.syntax: flex-start | flex-end | center | space-between | space-around | space-evenly
justify-content.description: Aligns flex items along the main axis of the flex container.

align-items.name: align-items
align-items.description: Aligns flex items along the cross axis of the flex container.

align-content.name: align-content
align-content.syntax: flex-start | flex-end | center | space-between | space-around | space-evenly | stretch
align-content.description: Aligns flex lines within a flex container when there is extra space.

justify-items.name: justify-items
justify-items.description: Aligns items along the main axis in a single line or grid cell.

grid-auto-flow.name: grid-auto-flow
grid-auto-flow.description: Controls the placement algorithm for auto-placed grid items.

grid-template-columns.name: grid-template-columns
grid-template-columns.description: Defines the column structure of the grid.

grid-template-rows.name: grid-template-rows
grid-template-rows.description: Defines the row structure of the grid.

grid-auto-columns.name: grid-auto-columns
grid-auto-columns.description: Specifies the size of columns created automatically in the grid.

grid-auto-rows.name: grid-auto-rows
grid-auto-rows.description: Specifies the size of rows created automatically in the grid.

row-gap.name: row-gap
row-gap.description: Sets the size of the gap between grid rows.

column-gap.name: column-gap
column-gap.description: Sets the size of the gap between grid columns.

gap.name: gap
gap.description: Shorthand for setting both row-gap and column-gap.

direction.name: direction
direction.description: Specifies the base writing direction for text and layout.

box-sizing.name: box-sizing
box-sizing.description: Controls how the total width and height of an element are calculated.

object-fit.name: object-fit
object-fit.description: Specifies how replaced content should be resized to fit its container.

object-position.name: object-position
object-position.description: Defines the alignment of replaced content within its box.

float.name: float
float.description: Removes the element from normal flow and positions it to the left or right.

clear.name: clear
clear.description: Specifies which sides of an element floating elements are not allowed to be adjacent to.

visibility.name: visibility
visibility.description: Specifies whether the element is visible, hidden, or collapses its space.

width.name: width
width.description: Specifies the width of the element's content area.

min-width.name: min-width
min-width.description: Sets the minimum width the element's content area can be.

max-width.name: max-width
max-width.description: Sets the maximum width the element's content area can be.

height.name: height
height.description: Specifies the height of the element's content area.

min-height.name: min-height
min-height.description: Sets the minimum height the element's content area can be.

max-height.name: max-height
max-height.description: Sets the maximum height the element's content area can be.

aspect-ratio.name: aspect-ratio
aspect-ratio.description: Sets a preferred width-to-height ratio for the element's box.

overflow.name: overflow
overflow.description: Controls what happens when content overflows the element's box.

scroll-behavior.name: scroll-behavior
scroll-behavior.description: Specifies the scrolling behavior for the element when scrolling is triggered.

overscroll-behavior.name: overscroll-behavior
overscroll-behavior.description: Specifies the behavior when scrolling reaches the boundary of a scroll container.

scroll-snap-type.name: scroll-snap-type
scroll-snap-type.description: Defines how the element's children snap to a grid or points when scrolling.

scroll-snap-align.name: scroll-snap-align
scroll-snap-align.description: Defines the alignment of the element's children within the scroll container.

scroll-snap-stop.name: scroll-snap-stop
scroll-snap-stop.description: Controls whether the scroll snap point is always respected or not.

scroll-margin.name: scroll-margin
scroll-margin.description: Sets the margin around the element for scroll snapping.

scroll-margin-block.name: scroll-margin-block
scroll-margin-block.description: Sets the margin around the element for scroll snapping in the block direction.

scroll-margin-inline.name: scroll-margin-inline
scroll-margin-inline.description: Sets the margin around the element for scroll snapping in the inline direction.

scroll-padding.name: scroll-padding
scroll-padding.description: Sets the padding around the element for scroll snapping.

scroll-padding-block.name: scroll-padding-block
scroll-padding-block.description: Sets the padding around the element for scroll snapping in the block direction.

scroll-padding-inline.name: scroll-padding-inline
scroll-padding-inline.description: Sets the padding around the element for scroll snapping in the inline direction.

position.name: position
position.description: Specifies the positioning method for the element.

top.name: top
top.description: Specifies the vertical offset of a positioned element from its containing block's top edge.

right.name: right
right.description: Specifies the horizontal offset of a positioned element from its containing block's right edge.

bottom.name: bottom
bottom.description: Specifies the vertical offset of a positioned element from its containing block's bottom edge.

left.name: left
left.description: Specifies the horizontal offset of a positioned element from its containing block's left edge.

z-index.name: z-index
z-index.description: Controls the stacking order of positioned elements.

padding-top.name: padding-top
padding-top.description: Sets the space between the element's content and its top border.

padding-right.name: padding-right
padding-right.description: Sets the space between the element's content and its right border.

padding-bottom.name: padding-bottom
padding-bottom.description: Sets the space between the element's content and its bottom border.

padding-left.name: padding-left
padding-left.description: Sets the space between the element's content and its left border.

padding.name: padding
padding.description: Sets the space between the element's content and all its borders.

margin-top.name: margin-top
margin-top.description: Sets the space outside the element's top border.

margin-right.name: margin-right
margin-right.description: Sets the space outside the element's right border.

margin-bottom.name: margin-bottom
margin-bottom.description: Sets the space outside the element's bottom border.

margin-left.name: margin-left
margin-left.description: Sets the space outside the element's left border.

margin.name: margin
margin.description: Sets the space outside all the element's borders.

background-color.name: background-color
background-color.description: Sets the background color of the element.

background.name: background
background.description: Shorthand for setting all background properties in one declaration.

background-image.name: background-image
background-image.description: Applies a background image to the element.

background-position.name: background-position
background-position.description: Positions the background image within the element.

background-size.name: background-size
background-size.description: Resizes the background image of the element.

background-repeat.name: background-repeat
background-repeat.description: Repeats the background image of the element.

background-clip.name: background-clip
background-clip.description: Defines how far the background extends within the element.

background-origin.name: background-origin
background-origin.description: Determines the positioning area for the background image.

background-blend-mode.name: background-blend-mode
background-blend-mode.description: Specifies how multiple background layers blend with each other.

background-attachment.name: background-attachment
background-attachment.description: Determines if the background image scrolls with the page or stays fixed.

mask-image.name: mask-image
mask-image.description: Applies a mask image to the element.

mask-position.name: mask-position
mask-position.description: Positions the mask image within the element.

mask-size.name: mask-size
mask-size.description: Resizes the mask image of the element.

mask-repeat.name: mask-repeat
mask-repeat.description: Repeats the mask image of the element.

mask-clip.name: mask-clip
mask-clip.description: Defines how far the mask extends within the element.

mask-origin.name: mask-origin
mask-origin.description: Determines the positioning area for the mask image.

mask-mode.name: mask-mode
mask-mode.description: Specifies the mask mode for the element.

mask-type.name: mask-type
mask-type.description: Specifies the mask type for the element.

mask-composite.name: mask-composite
mask-composite.description: Defines how multiple mask images are combined.

border-width.name: border-width
border-width.description: Sets the width of all sides of the element's borders.

border-style.name: border-style
border-style.syntax: none | hidden | dotted | dashed | solid | double | groove | ridge | inset | outset
border-style.description: Sets the style of all sides of the element's borders.

border-color.name: border-color
border-color.description: Sets the color of all sides of the element's borders.

border-top-width.name: border-top-width
border-top-width.description: Sets the width of the top border of the element.

border-right-width.name: border-right-width
border-right-width.description: Sets the width of the right border of the element.

border-bottom-width.name: border-bottom-width
border-bottom-width.description: Sets the width of the bottom border of the element.

border-left-width.name: border-left-width
border-left-width.description: Sets the width of the left border of the element.

border-top-style.name: border-top-style
border-top-style.syntax: none | hidden | dotted | dashed | solid | double | groove | ridge | inset | outset
border-top-style.description: Sets the style of the top border of the element.

border-right-style.name: border-right-style
border-right-style.syntax: none | hidden | dotted | dashed | solid | double | groove | ridge | inset | outset
border-right-style.description: Sets the style of the right border of the element.

border-bottom-style.name: border-bottom-style
border-bottom-style.syntax: none | hidden | dotted | dashed | solid | double | groove | ridge | inset | outset
border-bottom-style.description: Sets the style of the bottom border of the element.

border-left-style.name: border-left-style
border-left-style.syntax: none | hidden | dotted | dashed | solid | double | groove | ridge | inset | outset
border-left-style.description: Sets the style of the left border of the element.

border-top-color.name: border-top-color
border-top-color.description: Sets the color of the top border of the element.

border-right-color.name: border-right-color
border-right-color.description: Sets the color of the right border of the element.

border-bottom-color.name: border-bottom-color
border-bottom-color.description: Sets the color of the bottom border of the element.

border-left-color.name: border-left-color
border-left-color.description: Sets the color of the left border of the element.

border-radius.name: border-radius
border-radius.description: Rounds all corners of the element.

border-top-left-radius.name: border-top-left-radius
border-top-left-radius.description: Rounds the top-left corner of the element.

border-top-right-radius.name: border-top-right-radius
border-top-right-radius.description: Rounds the top-right corner of the element.

border-bottom-right-radius.name: border-bottom-right-radius
border-bottom-right-radius.description: Rounds the bottom-right corner of the element.

border-bottom-left-radius.name: border-bottom-left-radius
border-bottom-left-radius.description: Rounds the bottom-left corner of the element.

border-image-source.name: border-image-source
border-image-source.description: Specifies the source image for the border.

border-image-slice.name: border-image-slice
border-image-slice.description: Defines how the border image is sliced into regions.

border-image-width.name: border-image-width
border-image-width.description: Sets the width of the border image.

border-image-outset.name: border-image-outset
border-image-outset.description: Specifies the amount by which the border image area extends beyond the border box.

border-image-repeat.name: border-image-repeat
border-image-repeat.description: Specifies how the border image is repeated or stretched.

outline-width.name: outline-width
outline-width.description: Sets the width of the outline around the element.

outline-style.name: outline-style
outline-style.description: Sets the style of the outline around the element.

outline-color.name: outline-color
outline-color.description: Sets the color of the outline around the element.

outline-offset.name: outline-offset
outline-offset.description: Sets the space between the outline and the edge of the element's border.

font-family.name: font-family
font-family.description: Specifies the font family for the element's text.

font-size.name: font-size
font-size.description: Sets the size of the font.

font-weight.name: font-weight
font-weight.description: Sets the thickness or boldness of the font.

line-height.name: line-height
line-height.description: Sets the height of each line of text.

color.name: color
color.description: Sets the color of the text.

text-indent.name: text-indent
text-indent.description: Indents the first line of text by a specified amount.

text-overflow.name: text-overflow
text-overflow.description: Specifies how overflowed content that is not displayed is signaled to the user.

text-orientation.name: text-orientation
text-orientation.description: Specifies the orientation of text characters in a line.

text-align.name: text-align
text-align.description: Sets the horizontal alignment of text within its container.

text-decoration.name: text-decoration
text-decoration.description: Specifies decoration added to text, such as underline, overline, or line-through.

text-align-last.name: text-align-last
text-align-last.description: Specifies how the last line of a block or a line right before a forced line break is aligned.

text-combine-upright.name: text-combine-upright
text-combine-upright.description: Combines multiple characters into a single upright character, useful for vertical text layout.

white-space.name: white-space
white-space.description: Controls how whitespace inside the element is handled.

word-break.name: word-break
word-break.description: Specifies how words should break when reaching the end of a line.

writing-mode.name: writing-mode
writing-mode.description: Defines whether lines of text are laid out horizontally or vertically.

letter-spacing.name: letter-spacing
letter-spacing.description: Sets the spacing between characters of text.

line-break.name: line-break
line-break.description: Sets how/where to break lines within text.

word-spacing.name: word-spacing
word-spacing.description: Sets the spacing between words in text.

column-count.name: column-count
column-count.description: Specifies the number of columns an element should be divided into for multi-column layout.

column-width.name: column-width
column-width.description: Specifies the ideal width of columns in a multi-column layout.

column-rule-width.name: column-rule-width
column-rule-width.description: Specifies the width of the line that separates columns in a multi-column layout.

column-rule-style.name: column-rule-style
column-rule-style.description: Specifies the style of the line that separates columns.

column-rule-color.name: column-rule-color
column-rule-color.description: Specifies the color of the line that separates columns.

break-before.name: break-before
break-before.description: Specifies whether a page, column, or region break should occur before the element.

break-inside.name: break-inside
break-inside.description: Specifies whether a page, column, or region break should occur inside the element.

break-after.name: break-after
break-after.description: Specifies whether a page, column, or region break should occur after the element.

column-span.name: column-span
column-span.description: Specifies how many columns an element should span across in a multi-column layout.

column-fill.name: column-fill
column-fill.description: Specifies how content should be distributed between columns.

filter.name: filter
filter.description: Applies graphical effects such as blurring, brightness, contrast, and more to the element itself.

backdrop-filter.name: backdrop-filter
backdrop-filter.description: Applies graphical effects such as blurring or color shifting to the area behind an element.

transform.name: transform
transform.description: Transforms the element in 2D or 3D space.

box-shadow.name: box-shadow
box-shadow.description: Adds shadow effects around the element's frame.

opacity.name: opacity
opacity.description: Sets the transparency level of the element, affecting its content and children.
